name: Good Magic Points
description: Areas where positive magical energy concentrates create beneficial effects and attract benevolent magical creatures. The positive energy provides healing and protection, while the magical nature can attract both helpful spirits and those seeking to exploit the power.
atmosphere: Positive magical energy radiates like warm sunlight while benevolent magical creatures move with graceful purpose through power-rich areas. The air carries visible auras of protection and wellness. Every surface feels warm with healing energy. Your skin tingles with positive energy and the sense of spiritual protection.
